channel.title: Deathnote Default color
channel.description:
You know that default deathnote color? That Dark Sand color? We should have that as a color.
Why?
When using the bucket tool, you can do a "Bucket Erase" to make erasing parts of your deathnote more convenient. And sometimes you want that nice Dark Sand color as an actual color, but you're bad at erasing, so you could use the bucket tool to erase it more easily.

item.title: Deathnote Default color
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
You know that default deathnote color? That Dark Sand color? We should have that as a color.

Why?

When using the bucket tool, you can do a “Bucket Erase” to make erasing parts of your deathnote more convenient.
And sometimes you want that nice Dark Sand color as an actual color, but you’re bad at erasing, so you could use the bucket tool to erase it more easily.
